channel.title: Moparcraft awards/misc
channel.description:
Forums are boring, every other Mopar community has it's own awards (pretty much). Views on Moparcraft awards/suggestions?
e.g
Builder PVPer
Who knows? Does anyone have any nice themes they would recommend as well (minecraft based)?
I'm gonna see this topic through to it's completion, so please say something! Feel free to post other suggestions in here as well, this topic is just to pool ideas and then get them done.

item.title: Moparcraft awards/misc
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“Phaze One, post:99, topic:423178”]Shameless bump. I also believe that it should be a community vote, I doubt that the entire server is biased towards their friends and that it could be a fair judge.[/quote]This is how the entire community is run though, for a few reasons

Read full topic

item.title: Moparcraft awards/misc
item.dc:creator: @zuppers zuppers
item.description:
@zuppers wrote:

So I guess were waiting for mitb?

Read full topic

Shameless bump. I also believe that it should be a community vote, I doubt that the entire server is biased towards their friends and that it could be a fair judge.

item.title: Moparcraft awards/misc
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Then I see no issue with admins assigning them like the other awards, problem solved.

Read full topic

item.title: Moparcraft awards/misc
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

I’m fine with admins not getting them.

Read full topic

item.title: Moparcraft awards/misc
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Well that’s the thing, I can’t think of any way to rig it besides bribery (“influencing results using outside motives” is vague, and sounds like bribery as well), and the chances that no one will report it from the entire competition is low… and if they don’t, then like I said, it means the entire participating community is corrupt and the award would mean nothing anyways.

If we’re going to do it the same way as the other award, like you suggest (having the admins/staff assign them), then we should do it the same way as the other awards as well, meaning the admins can’t get them.

Read full topic

item.title: Moparcraft awards/misc
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

Lots of types, for example:

[ul][li]paying other people[/li][li]influencing results using outside motives[/li][/ul]

so on, let’s be creative here.

Read full topic

item.title: Moparcraft awards/misc
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Well, what type of rigging? That’s what I mean.

Read full topic

item.title: Moparcraft awards/misc
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

You really think if someone rigged this well enough they would get caught?

Read full topic

item.title: Moparcraft awards/misc
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“Tom_BETA, post:90, topic:423178”]Just seems like a waste of time, instead of following the system that has been in place on every Mopar community for a long time we must venture into a system that isn’t going to work, and can be corrupted without anyone providing evidence at the click of a finger.

Seems like an awful waste of time even building the stadium/layout when you think about it.[/quote]Wait, what? What type of corruption are you talking about here… it doesn’t seem to fit in with what CoonHunter said.

Read full topic

item.title: Moparcraft awards/misc
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

I didn’t think the stadium/layout was being built for awards, I thought it was being built to have fun games in?

Read full topic

item.title: Moparcraft awards/misc
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

Just seems like a waste of time, instead of following the system that has been in place on every Mopar community for a long time we must venture into a system that isn’t going to work, and can be corrupted without anyone providing evidence at the click of a finger.

Seems like an awful waste of time even building the stadium/layout when you think about it.

item.description:

I don’t even know what type of ‘tournament corruption’ Tom is talking about
[/quote]
You can pay people to lose if they fight you? Tournaments can be easily corrupted even irl if people are not careful.[/quote]

Again, if that happens then all the awards go away, it’s not like they mean anything in the first place?

item.dc:creator: @krackkid Krackkid
item.description:
@krackkid wrote:

I remember when we use to get in trouble for PvP, If only rey, Agl, and me got awards for attacking Haven way back when Secret tunnels, hidden rooms in the fountain. Good times but I support a castle wars style thing.

Read full topic

[/quote]
Until you have a strong defending argument, yes. I’m going to make a separate topic for Cwars though.[/quote]I guess I’ll get working on my prototype.

Edit: Maybe when Minecraft’s login server is fixed.

item.title: Moparcraft awards/misc
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

[quote=“zuppers, post:75, topic:423178”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=525829.msg3834049#msg3834049 date=1322775056]
I say scratch the plugin idea, it wouldn’t be needed for the castle wars thing, and a KDR thing could be too easily spoofed
[/quote]How would it be spoofed just have it not count the kill if the other player has no wep’s or was already killed by that person within x amount of time.[/quote]

It can be rigged. Considering people can make and infinite number of accounts and swords take all of 6 seconds to obtain, it’s probably going to get abused in some way, maybe to the point of “I’ll give you 64 iron if I can kill you 25 times” or something stupid like that.

Also, I found the plugin that can work with warzones
http://forums.bukkit.org/threads/mech-fun-war-v1-6-de-gaulle-final-minecraft-tdm-ctf-1337.250/
Maybe expand w2 in an area just to fit this? Also, the plugin includes…

Features: 
As a player, you get a fast-paced PVP experience in SMP.
    Join a battle by entering through the warzone lobby. There is one gate per team (team diamond, gold or iron): step in to join that team.
    Your inventory is saved when you join a battle, and restored when you exit.
    When you die inside a warzone, you get instantly teleported back to your spawn, and one life is taken from your team's life pool. When that pool runs out, the other teams score a point!
    Steal the enemy team flag to score for your team.
    Fight over monuments, control points that, when captured, restore health to your teammates.
As a warzone maker, you have total control.
    Take advantage cool landscape features or existing player-build structures and incorporate them in new warzones.
    Tons of options: friendly-fire, auto-assign, turn off PVP outside warzones, define respawn loadouts specific to each zone, turn players' heads into team-colored blocks instead of giving them team-colored helmets, and more!
[b]All the blocks in a zone are reset at the end of every battle.[/b]
Players are prevented from entering or leaving a zone - except through the designated warzone lobby - by a magic glass wall.
A warhub can be created to link all your zones together.</blockquote>

Read full topic
